segments.text: Sun-set hotel . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have booked a room for 24th . It's a double room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , please . Let me check it for you . Yes , you're right . You will keep it for 3 days .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , now I want to change the date from 24th to 28th .
segments.speaker: S2
